snippet.title: Heretic's Fork - Official Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Heretic's Fork is a deck-building tower defense game with bullet-hell attributes. Players will manage Hell itself by punishing sinners via the game's deck-building computer system to construct hellish towers in an effort to keep the hordes in check. Heretic's Fork is launching in Q3 2023 for PC with a demo available as part of the Steam Next Fest 2023.

#HereticsFork #SteamNextFest
